you_have_been_challenged1.message: Knight, you have been challenged to fight.

the_time_has_come1.message: Pilot, the time has come. May the best win!

of_your_money1.message: of your money, I hope you do not mind.

you_have_been_challenged2.message: Sir, you are in my domain. To fight must continue.

the_time_has_come2.message: What a beautiful ship you, Pilot. Nice guns too. Do you know how to use them?

you_have_been_challenged3.message: Stop! These are my domains. You must fight to continue.

the_time_has_come3.message: Wow! Worthy opponent for an old pirate. I guess you know how to use your weapons.
